meta.description: Using real feedback and sponsor users to design an internal app that enabled ambassadors to quickly and easily manage their work responsibilities.

content.value: Total Tastings is a liquor and product promotion company based in St. Louis, Missouri. They assign product ambassadors to conduct liquor tastings inside retail stores to help promote and sell products.
They came to us at RYSE with the idea of adding a new survey feature to their tastings which would create a way for their clients to get new insights from their product promotions.
Part of making this new feature possible was updating the way tastings were managed and conducted to create a better experience for their ambassadors.

Part of making this new feature possible was updating the way tastings were managed and conducted to create a better experience for their ambassadors.
